titles.title: For the relief of Pauline Applewhite Saunders.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/21/1995--Introduced. Deems a deceased named individual to have had 20 years of service on the date such individual received a letter erroneously informing him that he had over 20 years of service. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to make specified retirement payments and annuity benefits to a certain named survivor of such individual.
